summary:
The Guardian is a well-known British newspaper, first published in 1821 as The Manchester Guardian. It moved to London and changed its name in 1959. The paper is owned by the Guardian Media Group, which aims to keep the newspaper independent and free from outside influence.

Known for its left-leaning views, The Guardian has a reputation for quality journalism. It has a large online presence and is trusted by many readers for its digital content. The newspaper has broken important stories, like the News International phone-hacking scandal and secrets about government surveillance.
title: The Guardian
